description: Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a building ranging from four to eight storeys in height (maximum 27.87m AOD) comprising 417 sqm of commercial floorspace (Use Classes A1 retail, A2 financial and professional services and/or B1 business) and 64 residential units (27 x one bedroom, 22 x two bedroom, 11 x three bedroom and 4 x four bedroom) with balconies, terraces and gardens, communal amenity space, 92 bicycle spaces, 21 car parking spaces, refuse storage, access and associated works
